summary: Tested 3 bug fixes for MyTrack smart-link service. All 3 bugs are now FIXED: 1) Extra back arrow removed from public page, 2) Infinite scroll navigation now works correctly (fixed by adding 'slug' dependency to useEffect), 3) Delete page button in Dashboard works correctly.
passed_tests: Bug #1 FIXED: No extra 'back' arrow on public page with site mode - only left/right navigation arrows visible
Bug #2 FIXED: Infinite scroll navigation works - arrows cycle through pages correctly (yefn0 → 2l1ib → u6y8y → yefn0)
Bug #3 FIXED: Delete page button in Dashboard works - dropdown menu shows delete option, confirmation dialog appears, page is deleted successfully
Site mode toggle works correctly in Dashboard
Navigation tooltips show correct previous/next page titles
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed missing 'slug' dependency in useEffect for fetchUserPages - this was causing navigation to not update currentPageIndex when navigating between pages
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 reported bugs are fixed. The app has 3 pages for admin user (Wesley Joseph & Danny Brown - Peace Of Mind, KATSEYE - Internet Girl, Katchafire - Revival 2.0). Site mode is enabled. Navigation arrows cycle correctly. Delete functionality works. Note: correct login credentials are admin@example.com / admin123 (not 'password').
